00023 #include <Elem_EF.h>
00024 #include <Tri_EF.h>
00025 #include <Tetra_EF.h>
00026 #include <Quadri_EF.h>
00027 #include <Hexa_EF.h>
00028 
00029 Implemente_deriv(Elem_EF_base);
00030 Implemente_instanciable(Elem_EF,"Elem_EF",DERIV(Elem_EF_base));
00031

00033 
00034 // printOn et readOn
00035 
00036 Sortie& Elem_EF::printOn(Sortie& s ) const
00037 {
00038   return s << valeur() ;
00039 }
00040 
00041 Entree& Elem_EF::readOn(Entree& s )
00042 {
00043   Nom type;
00044   s >> type;
00045   if(type == "Tri_EF")
00046     *this =  Tri_EF();
00047   else if(type == "Tetra_EF")
00048     *this =  Tetra_EF();
00049   else if(type == "Quadri_EF")
00050     *this =  Quadri_EF();
00051   else if(type == "Hexa_EF")
00052     *this =  Hexa_EF();
00053   else
00054     {
00055       Cerr << type << " n'est pas un Elem_EF" << finl;
00056       exit();
00057     }
00058   return s ;
00059 }
00060 
00061 //
00062 //! determination du type
00063 void Elem_EF::typer(Nom type_elem_geom)
00064 {
00065 // Cerr << "Elem_EF::typer()" << finl ;
00066   Nom type;
00067   if(type_elem_geom=="Triangle")
00068     type="Tri_EF";
00069   else if(type_elem_geom=="Tetraedre")
00070     type="Tetra_EF";
00071   else if(type_elem_geom=="Quadrangle")
00072     type="Quadri_EF";
00073   else if(type_elem_geom=="Hexaedre_VEF")
00074     type="Hexa_EF";
00075   else if(type_elem_geom=="Segment")
00076     type="Segment_EF";
00077   else if(type_elem_geom=="Segment_axi")
00078     type="Segment_EF_axi";
00079   else if(type_elem_geom=="Point")
00080     type="Point_EF";
00081   else
00082     {
00083       Cerr << "probleme de typage dans Elem_EF::typer" << finl;
00084       Cerr << "type geometrique : " << type_elem_geom << finl;
00085       exit();
00086     }
00087   DERIV(Elem_EF_base)::typer(type);
00088 // Cerr << "type retenu : " << valeur().que_suis_je() << finl ;
00089 }
